member.name: T:ExtraWidgets.Dialogs.Dialog_CancelResetAccept
member.summary: A Dialog with a Cancel/Reset/Accept buttons and a status message. Useful for user input dialogs

member.name: M:ExtraWidgets.Dialogs.Dialog_CancelResetAccept.#ctor
member.summary: A Dialog with a Cancel/Reset/Accept buttons and a status message. Useful for user input dialogs

member.name: M:ExtraWidgets.Dialogs.Dialog_CancelResetAccept.DoWindowContents(UnityEngine.Rect)
member.summary:
Draw the contents of the window here
You will need to leave a space 30f vertically at the bottom of the window and call DrawBottomButtons(Rect) to draw the bottom buttons till I fix it up

member.name: M:ExtraWidgets.Dialogs.Dialog_CancelResetAccept.DrawBottomButtons(UnityEngine.Rect)
member.summary: You can override this if you want to change what shows up in the bottom row

member.name: M:ExtraWidgets.Dialogs.Dialog_CancelResetAccept.OnAccept
member.summary:
This gets called when the user clicks the accept button
Remember to verify the input as needed before using it

member.name: M:ExtraWidgets.Dialogs.Dialog_CancelResetAccept.OnCancel
member.summary:
Override this to change what happens when the user clicks the cancel button
Default behavior is to close and return control to the previous window

member.name: M:ExtraWidgets.Dialogs.Dialog_CancelResetAccept.OnReset
member.summary:
This gets called when the user clicks the reset button
Expected action is to return all values to the state before this dialog opened or a default value

member.name: M:ExtraWidgets.Dialogs.Dialog_CancelResetAccept.SetMessage(System.String)
member.summary:
Displays a message to the user
Useful for giving the user feedback on a input validation error

member.name: M:ExtraWidgets.Dialogs.Dialog_CancelResetAccept.SetMessage(System.String,UnityEngine.Color)
member.summary:
Displays a message to the user
Useful for giving the user feedback on a input validation error

member.name: T:ExtraWidgets.FloatMenu.FloatMenuOptionColorPicker
member.summary: Provides a FloatMenuOption with a simple color picker. Only Supports up to 5 colors.

member.name: M:ExtraWidgets.FloatMenu.FloatMenuOptionColorPicker.#ctor(System.Action{UnityEngine.Color},Verse.MenuOptionPriority,System.Collections.Generic.List{UnityEngine.Color},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Creates a simple color picker with a maximum of 10 colors. The selected color is passed to the action.
If colors is null, it will display the default colors: White, Red, Green, Blue, Yellow

member.name: M:ExtraWidgets.FloatMenu.FloatMenuOptionColorPicker.Chosen(UnityEngine.Color)
member.summary: Called when a user makes a selection. Invokes the action passed to this FloatMenuOption

member.name: M:ExtraWidgets.FloatMenu.FloatMenuOptionColorPicker.DoGUI(UnityEngine.Rect,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Called every OnGUI. Draws the FloatMenu contents.
